citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b)
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process from 10:36am
until 11:06am on 05/20/2014.
Correct upon receipt
This was an "1st" Attempted inspection.
